#?????????_????_20????? #??20 #THE RUSSIAN S-400 AIRCRAFT WAS DESTROYED BY THE DOWNED JEFF AIRCRAFT. He has more than 150 sorties under his belt. "Jef" fired about fifty HARM missiles and more than a dozen JDAM guided aerial bombs, shot down more than ten drones, destroyed enemy air defense more than once and covered Ukrainian attack aircraft dozens of times. November 23. "Jeff" gets into his MiG-29, loaded with American "HARM" missiles. The most important target is the Russian S-400, which is "hidden" behind Donetsk. He knows that the brothers will work as police officers, so if the "four hundred" is not destroyed first, the boys are in serious danger.
